segment.source: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: Analytics
segment.target: Analytics

segment.source: Analytics
segment.target: Analytics

segment.source: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: Statistics and charts let you know how your apps are doing—from how many customers you've reached to how they're using your app and what they have to say about it.
segment.target: Statistics and charts let you know how your apps are doing—from how many customers you've reached to how they're using your app and what they have to say about it.

segment.source: You can also find info on app health, ad usage, and more.
segment.target: You can also find info on app health, ad usage, and more.

segment.source: View the reports in the dashboard, or download the reports you need to analyze your data offline.
segment.target: View the reports in the dashboard, or download the reports you need to analyze your data offline.

segment.source: Note In addition to the dashboard reports, you can programmatically access some analytics data by using the Windows Store analytics REST API.
segment.target: Note In addition to the dashboard reports, you can programmatically access some analytics data by using the Windows Store analytics REST API.

segment.source: Analytics for all your apps
segment.target: Analytics for all your apps

segment.source: Your dashboard overview page also includes a roll-up view to gather details about all your apps.
segment.target: Your dashboard overview page also includes a roll-up view to gather details about all your apps.

segment.source: The stats shown on the overview page will vary, depending on your apps.
segment.target: The stats shown on the overview page will vary, depending on your apps.

segment.source: When you download analytic reports, you also have the option to download reports about all of your apps.
segment.target: When you download analytic reports, you also have the option to download reports about all of your apps.

segment.source: Note that you will need to access the Download reports page in the Analytics section for one of your apps, but you are not limited to downloading data only for that particular app.
segment.target: Note that you will need to access the Download reports page in the Analytics section for one of your apps, but you are not limited to downloading data only for that particular app.

segment.source: Available reports for each app
segment.target: Available reports for each app

segment.source: In this section you'll find details about the info presented in each of the following reports:
segment.target: In this section you'll find details about the info presented in each of the following reports:

segment.source: Acquisitions report
segment.target: Acquisitions report

segment.source: Health report
segment.target: Health report

segment.source: Ratings report
segment.target: Ratings report

segment.source: Reviews report
segment.target: Reviews report

segment.source: Usage report
segment.target: Usage report

segment.source: IAP acquisitions report
segment.target: IAP acquisitions report

segment.source: Ad mediation report
segment.target: Ad mediation report

segment.source: Advertising performance report
segment.target: Advertising performance report

segment.source: App install ads report
segment.target: App install ads report

segment.source: Channels and conversions report
segment.target: Channels and conversions report

segment.source: Note You may not see data in all of these reports, depending on your app's specific features and implementation.
segment.target: Note You may not see data in all of these reports, depending on your app's specific features and implementation.

segment.source: Page and section filters
segment.target: Page and section filters

segment.source: Each report includes filters that you can use to drill down into your data.
segment.target: Each report includes filters that you can use to drill down into your data.

segment.source: Near the top of the page you'll see Apply filters.
segment.target: Near the top of the page you'll see Apply filters.

segment.source: You can use these filters to limit or expand the scope of all of the charts and info on the page.
segment.target: You can use these filters to limit or expand the scope of all of the charts and info on the page.

segment.source: Within each particular chart, you may also see individual section filters.
segment.target: Within each particular chart, you may also see individual section filters.

segment.source: These will limit the data shown only for that particular chart.
segment.target: These will limit the data shown only for that particular chart.

segment.source: The specific filters vary by report.
segment.target: The specific filters vary by report.

segment.source: The topics in this section will explain which filters are available and will describe the other data on the page for each report.
segment.target: The topics in this section will explain which filters are available and will describe the other data on the page for each report.
